data.actual_result: It's displaying your avatar in portrait mode and multiple times
data.expected_result: It should display you're avatar in full screen and in landscape mode
data.short_description: On a server with the screensharing option, without any screen shared, putting the full screen mode will display it in portrait mod
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a vocal channel on a server with the screen sharing option) (you can create a server with the option after some tries)  - Left click on the channel name (it will display your avatar in big at almost full screen)  - Click on the full screen button at the bottom right  - Observe
